title: I can't log on... :c (Connection Error)
body:
When initially installing league a few days ago everything was fine. I was playing on the beta client. Then an error occurred. Checked web page for help. Finally fixed the problem by configuring DNS. League worked just fine. After logging on yesterday morning I couldn't log in.

I reset basically everything: League, my computer, and the internet router. My internet is just fine. Everything else runs on my computer. I re-installed league and it finally shows me the login screen and gives me this:

"Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server.
Information regarding what may have caused this error can be found here.
Service availability can be viewed on the League of Legends Server Status web page".

Tried Hextech tool and still nothing. I think it has something to do with the beta client.. prior to install I would choose to update to beta but it would never go through. Skipping the beta league began to actually install.. Progress, but no success in the end.

replies.body:
It sounds like your connection to our servers overall is *pretty unstable*. This could be for a number of reasons, most likely one or more network settings that conflict with League. Our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will walk you through steps that commonly resolve this, so I strongly recommend those steps be your next in troubleshooting this.

If you still experience these issues after taking those steps, let me know.
